PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-00462011-02-03AAFC,  CFIA,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Agricultural Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Administered and Enforced by the Canadian Food Inspection Agency
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS ADMINISTERED AND ENFORCED BY THE CANADIAN FOOD INSPECTION AGENCY, in order to remove the requirements associated with a destination inspection, allowing the produce industry and CFIA to move to a stronger business orientation to manage requests for commercial quality inspection service, delivery of destination inspections, and fees. Strengthening the destination inspection services will assist in reducing opportunities for some industry participants to make fraudulent claims regarding the quality of the produce being received.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0011 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
AttachmentsAttachment
